str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: From anti and the middle voice of tasso; to range oneself against, i.e. Oppose.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: From blasphemos; to vilify; specially, to speak impiously.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To shake off; mid: I shake off from myself. From ek and tinasso; to shake violently.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A long flowing outer garment, tunic. Neuter of a presumed derivative of ennumi; a dress.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Blood, literally, figuratively or specially; by implication, bloodshed, also kindred.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From the primary kapto; the head, literally or figuratively.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Clean.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
A primary particle of present time; 'now'; also as noun or adjective present or immediate.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 1st Person Singular
str2: To travel, journey, go, die.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Probably from etho; a race, i.e. A tribe; specially, a foreign one.
